<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Remove the dependency of business applications list on business capabilities chosen in project form.</description>
        <name>Remove BA-BC reference in project</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function removeRefQualifier(tableName){
	//Remove reference qualifier on Business Applications column in table
	try{
		var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
		gr.addQuery('name',tableName);
		gr.addQuery('element','business_applications');
		gr.addQuery('use_reference_qualifier','advanced');		
		gr.query();
		if (gr.next() && gr.getValue('reference_qual')== "javascript: new APMBusinessPlanner().getRelatedApplications(current.business_capabilities);"){
			//Remove ref qualifier
			gr.setValue('use_reference_qualifier','simple');
			gr.setValue('reference_qual','');
			gr.update();
			gs.info("Fix Script-Remove BA-BC reference in table - "+ tableName +": Removed BA reference qualifier");
		}
	}
	catch(err){
		gs.info("Fix Script-Remove BA-BC reference in table - "+ tableName +": Failed with error "+err);
	}
}

removeRefQualifier('pm_project');
]]></script>
